description: This file defines an Angular component named AdminApprovalsComponent, which manages and displays a list of analyst approval applications, providing functionalities to view details, approve, or reject applications.

classes.name: AdminApprovalsComponent
classes.description: Angular component for managing and displaying approval applications queue, with functionalities to view, approve, or reject applications.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook to load data when component initializes.

methods.name: view
methods.description: Opens a modal window to view details of the selected approval application.

methods.name: approve
methods.description: Sends approval request for the selected application; updates UI based on response.

methods.name: reject
methods.description: Sends rejection request for the selected application; updates UI based on response.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the approvals data from the server.
